Here is a suggestion for the whole group concerning this matter. I 
know that a lot of people here like G1 style. What if there were no 
autobots or decepticons AS A FACTION and that instead they were 
integrated as parts of the Maximals and Predacons? This way, there 
could be three neutral faction as well as autobots and decepticons. I 
don't know if you understand what I'm saying, but it makes a lot of 
sense to me.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., nbwrpg@y... wrote:
> 
> Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
> nbwrpg group:
> 
> Which would you prefer: having the 
> Decepticons, Autobots, and a neutral 
> faction, or having three neutral 
> factions in addition to the Predacons 
> and the Maximals? 
> 
>   o Autobots, Decepticons, and Neutral 
>   o Three Neutral 
> 
> 
> To vote, please visit the following web page:
> 
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 
> 
> Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
> not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
> web site listed above.
> 
> Thanks!
